title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same capabilities as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat model inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to ‘Open WebUI’); chat history, model management, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient CLI wrapper written in Rust; chat, generate, manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app backed by Ollama; showcases streaming responses and model selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Starter template for building RAG apps with Ollama, LangChain and Chroma locally.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in chat; supports slash commands and custom models.

title: ollama-npm (unofficial wrapper)
summary: Community npm package that downloads and wraps the Ollama binary for Node projects.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-gpt4all-importer
summary: Utility to convert and import GPT4All models into Ollama’s model library format.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that provides a chat interface widget backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-rustico
summary: Lightweight Rust wrapper focused on embedded deployments; no_std support planned.

title: ollama-pypi (model downloader helper)
summary: Tiny PyPI utility to batch-download popular Ollama models and checksum them offline.
